# showsPointsOfInterest

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.

## Declaration

```swift
var showsPointsOfInterest: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When this property is set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the map displays icons and labels for restaurants, schools, and other relevant points of interest. The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Properties

- **filterType**: The filter options for the search results.
- **pinColor**: The color of the pin head.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.
- **mapType**: The map’s visual style.
